name: Hyundai city
about: The City offers a spacious and comfortable cabin designed for everyday family travel. It delivers smooth performance with refined driving dynamics for city and highway use.  Modern features and reliable build quality make it a trusted and practical choice.

name: Wagon R
about: The Wagon R offers a spacious cabin with excellent practicality for daily use. A reliable and comfortable choice with modern features for everyday travel.

name: Defender
about: The Defender combines rugged capability with modern luxury, built for both off-road challenges and city comfort. Its powerful performance and premium features make every drive confident and refined.

name: Mahindra be6
about: The Mahindra BE6 is a bold electric SUV designed for modern urban commuting. Its striking design, strong performance, and advanced features offer a refined and confident driving experience.
